participant_1.background:
I am afraid of failing to reach my full potential.
i work as a vet.
i am a vet tech.
i can read in english and french.
I'm taking advantage of my newfound freedom to travel and see the world.

participant_2.background:
I listen to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
i love cooking.
i am allergic to milk.
I practice yoga and meditation to keep fit and calm my mind.
I can't wait to get home and tend to my greenhouse after the concert tonight.

content.text: I'm so glad to be done with school! I'm now a vet tech, and I'm excited to start my new job.
I'm glad you're happy! I love my job as a chef, and I get to cook all day long.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love cooking too. What's your favorite thing to make?
I love making pasta dishes, especially lasagna. I also love making homemade pizza.
Those sound amazing! I'm not very good at making pasta, but I love eating it.
You should try making it yourself! It's not as hard as you might think, and it's so much more delicious than store-bought pasta.
I might have to try that. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! Have you been to any good concerts lately?
I went to a Beatles concert last night. It was amazing!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love the Beatles.
Me too! They're my favorite band.
I'm glad you had a good time. I'm going to go home and tend to my greenhouse now.
Have fun! I'm going to go relax and watch some TV.
